name: APLX 235
title: Second Language Teaching
description: Helps novice instructors learn about the theory and practice of language teaching and learning. Focuses on current methods used in communicatively oriented classrooms. Topics include: listening comprehension, grammar, vocabulary, reading, writing, and testing/assessment. Students cannot receive credit for this course and APLX 135. (Formerly LAAD 201.)

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to graduate students.
